x: 警察官・けいさつかん

sense.gloss: official residence (e.g. of the prime minister)
government and people, government and private sector, public and private sector
government and municipal offices, public agencies
government official, public servant, civil servant
local governor (Edo period), local magistrate, bailiff
director (highest of the four administrative positions of the ritsuryō system), chief
person (usually a woman) who officiates at religious ceremonies (on the Yaeyama Islands in Okinawa)
assistant director (second highest of the four administrative positions of the ritsuryō system)

r_ele.r: おおいまつりごとのつかさ

sense.gloss: Department of State (under the ritsuryō system)
administrative law judge, appeal examiner (e.g. in patents)
